definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="67" w="296">Tests if the entity has OP with level 4 command permission on a server, or if the single-player world has commands enabled.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_canusecommand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="permissionlevel"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_gamemode"><field name="gamemode">SURVIVAL</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
